Position The hotel Mastai of Senigallia is open all year round, with an unbeatable location, 800 meters from the motorway exit, 600 from the center of Senigallia.
Restaurant For the winter period is open at from Monday to Thursday. During the summer the half-board service will be provided through service buffet at the Finis Africae Country House in Senigallia approx 5 mins away from the hotel Mastai. The two structures are mutually connected by a free shuttle at scheduled times.
